Short description: High Performance Flexible VSD Marine / Power Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex MDXCY-CL Series is a flexible VSD marine and power cable designed for demanding applications. It features a transparent PVC sheath for easy inspection and durability, making it suitable for AC Variable Speed Drive (VSD) connections in fixed installations or occasional flexing without tensile load. The cable offers advanced RFI and EMI protection with double screening and interstitial earth cores (6mm² and above) to ensure effective shielding against electromagnetic interference. Constructed with tinned copper, it is flame retardant, UV stabilised, and resistant to moisture, oxidation, ozone, and sunlight. Additionally, it is rated for permanent submersion up to 200 metres, making it a reliable choice for marine, industrial, and submerged installations

Short description: High Performance Fixed Copper Tape VSD Power Cable Flexible Conductors for Fixed Applications
Marketing description: Firstflex KSXCY Series is a high-performance fixed wiring VSD power cable, designed for reliable connection of AC Variable Speed Drives (VSD) or other applications requiring fixed EMC screened cables. Featuring flexible Class 5 conductors, it offers ease of installation while maintaining robust performance. The cable's copper tape screening, combined with interstitial earth cores (6mm² and above), ensures effective RFI and EMI protection, minimizing interference and reactance with nearby devices. UV stabilised and flame retardant, it is resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, making it suitable for demanding environments. For optimal performance, it should be earthed using EMC-compatible glands, such as the Firstflex GM-EMC-FT Series.

Short description: High Performance Flexible VSD Power Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex FDXCY Series is a high-performance flexible VSD power cable designed for reliable operation in challenging environments. Ideal for AC Variable Speed Drive (VSD) connections, it provides flexibility for fixed installations and occasional flexing without tensile load. Featuring advanced RFI and EMI protection with double screening (CBS and foil tape) and interstitial earth cores (6mm² and above), it ensures excellent shielding against low-frequency and electromagnetic interference. The cable is UV stabilised, flame retardant, and moisture resistant, with robust resistance to oxidation, ozone, sunlight, heat, oil, and chemicals. For optimal performance, it should be earthed using an EMC-compatible gland, making it a dependable solution for industrial and commercial applications.

Short description: Ultra Performance Flexible Rubber SDI Cable 0.6/1kV 110°C
Marketing description: Firstflex BFX series cables are engineered for ultra-performance and versatility across various demanding applications. Featuring a Chemtuff sheath, they offer exceptional resistance to chemicals, solvents, oils, and fats. Ideal for power switchboards, flexible droppers from busbars, transformers, load banks, and other equipment requiring fixed or flexible cables, these cables also excel in pumping applications, being suitable for permanent submersion up to 500 metres. They are perfect for welding and electrode leads, generator sets for temporary power supplies, and automotive uses such as battery leads, jumpers, and electric forklifts. Additionally, the BFX series is excellent for audio equipment requiring oxygen-free copper wire and telecommunications where finely stranded large cross-section cables are needed for minimal voltage drop. Rated at 0.6/1kV and 110°C, these flexible rubber SDI cables deliver reliable performance in the toughest conditions.

Short description: High Performance Flexible Cable 250/440V 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex PF series is a high-performance flexible cable rated at 250/440V and 90°C, designed for a wide range of applications. It is ideal for interconnecting various forms of lighting, including fluorescent fittings, high bays, low bays, floodlights, and reading lamps. Additionally, it is suitable for use as interconnection leads for appliances and as domestic power extension leads. The PF series features metre marking for better length control, extremely fine stranded copper conductors for superior flexibility and conductivity, and UV stabilisation for outdoor durability. It is also flame retardant and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, ensuring reliable performance in diverse environments.

Short description: Standard Performance Fixed Circular TPS Cable 450/750V 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex MC Series is designed for a variety of applications, including power distribution for mains and submains in fixed installations, direct burial as part of a Category B wiring system, and outdoor use in wet locations not prone to mechanical damage. Additionally, with the correct explosion-proof glands, this cable can be installed in hazardous areas subject to explosion risks, in compliance with AS/NZS 60079.14. The product features metre marking for better length control, UV stabilisation, flame retardancy, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals.

Short description: Ultra Performance Flexible Rubber Industrial / Marine Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C AS/NZS 5000.1, IEC 60092, H07RN-F
Marketing description: Firsflex MLG2 Series ultra performance flexible rubber cable is a versatile and robust solution designed for a wide range of industrial and marine applications. Rated at 0.6/1kV and capable of withstanding temperatures up to 90°C, this cable meets AS/NZS 5000.1, IEC 60092, and H07RN-F standards. It is ideal for hazardous areas when used with explosion-proof glands and can be submerged in polluted liquids up to 10 meters, making it perfect for wastewater treatment plants. The durable CPE sheath makes it suitable for outdoor temporary power supplies and lighting in entertainment settings. Additionally, its flexible tinned copper construction is Lloyds approved for marine use, including installation in pleasure craft and super yachts. The MLG2 Series is also excellent for power switchboards, flexible droppers, transformers, load banks, and construction sites due to its outstanding flexibility and durability. Notably, it can be permanently submerged up to 500 meters, making it ideal for pumping applications. Key features include UV stabilisation, flame retardance, water and moisture resistance, good elongation at break, excellent dielectric properties, and resistance to environmental factors such as oxidation, ozone, and sunlight. This cable also exhibits very good behaviour in varying outdoor temperatures, along with good tensile strength, tearing strength, and abrasion resistance.

Short description: Ultra Performance Flexible Rubber Cable 250/440V 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex OD Series is an ultra-performance flexible rubber cable rated at 250/440V and 90°C, known for its exceptional durability and versatility. The CHEMTUFF Ordinary Duty OD Series is specifically designed for applications requiring high resistance to chemicals, solvents, oils, and fats. It is ideal for use as extension leads on construction sites due to its outstanding flexibility and excellent coiling characteristics, even in cold conditions. Additionally, it is suitable for powering machine tools, construction and engineering equipment, and conveyors. The OD Series boasts several key features: it is UV stabilised, flame retardant, extremely flexible, and resistant to water and moisture, making it suitable for permanent submersion up to 200 metres. Furthermore, it is resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, ensuring reliable performance in demanding environments.

Short description: Ultra Performance Flexible Rubber Double Sheath Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex Chemtuff Twinskin HD Series is an ultra-performance flexible rubber double sheath cable designed for rigorous applications. Rated at 0.6/1kV and capable of withstanding temperatures up to 90°C, this cable is ideal for environments requiring high resistance to chemicals, solvents, oils, and fats. Its outstanding flexibility and cable memory make it perfect for extension leads on construction sites, while the double sheath with a separator provides extra safety for machine tools, construction and engineering equipment, and conveyors. The HD Series is also suitable for permanent submersion up to 200 metres, making it ideal for pumping applications. Additionally, its extra durable SER sheath ensures reliability for outdoor temporary power supply and lighting leads in entertainment settings. Key features include UV stabilisation, flame retardancy, extreme flexibility, water and moisture resistance, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals.

Short description: Ultra Performance Flexible Rubber Industrial / Marine Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C AS/NZS 5000.1, IEC 60092, H07RN-F
Marketing description: Firsflex MLG2 Series ultra performance flexible rubber cable is a versatile and robust solution designed for a wide range of industrial and marine applications. Rated at 0.6/1kV and capable of withstanding temperatures up to 90°C, this cable meets AS/NZS 5000.1, IEC 60092, and H07RN-F standards. It is ideal for hazardous areas when used with explosion-proof glands and can be submerged in polluted liquids up to 10 meters, making it perfect for wastewater treatment plants. The durable CPE sheath makes it suitable for outdoor temporary power supplies and lighting in entertainment settings. Additionally, its flexible tinned copper construction is Lloyds approved for marine use, including installation in pleasure craft and super yachts. The MLG2 Series is also excellent for power switchboards, flexible droppers, transformers, load banks, and construction sites due to its outstanding flexibility and durability. Notably, it can be permanently submerged up to 500 meters, making it ideal for pumping applications. Key features include UV stabilisation, flame retardance, water and moisture resistance, good elongation at break, excellent dielectric properties, and resistance to environmental factors such as oxidation, ozone, and sunlight. This cable also exhibits very good behaviour in varying outdoor temperatures, along with good tensile strength, tearing strength, and abrasion resistance.

Short description: Extreme Performance Flexible Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex EP Series Extreme Performance Flexible Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C is designed to meet the rigorous demands of various industries. Its microbe and hydrolysis-resistant, super durable PUR sheath makes it ideal for the food and beverage industry, as well as laboratory environments. This cable excels in applications requiring extreme wear resistance and reverse bending, such as floor sanding and drills. Its robust construction also makes it suitable for outdoor temporary power supplies, extension leads, and agricultural equipment. Additionally, the EP Series is perfect for materials and handling systems, including cable spring reelers and large energy chains. It maintains extreme flexibility even in low temperatures, making it suitable for use in freezers and ski fields. Key features include extreme resistance to abrasion, tearing, and notching, good reverse bending strength, a non-marking sheath, and resistance to environmental factors like oxidation, ozone, and sunlight. The cable is also halogen-free, UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to water, moisture, seawater, wastewater, heat, oil, and chemicals. With excellent tensile strength, tearing strength, elongation at break, and dielectric properties, it also offers avian and rodent resistance.

Short description: Standard Performance Fixed Building / Conduit Wire 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: The Firstflex CW series is versatile, catering to various applications such as power distribution in switchboards and panel wiring, control and signal wiring in control panels, and wiring within metal or PVC conduits and other protective enclosures. It is also suitable for earthing in housing and light commercial buildings, as well as for earth bonding. This product boasts several features including flame retardancy, UV stabilisation, a tight bending radius, metre marking from 0.5mm to 25mm for better length control, and resistance to oil and chemicals.

Short description: High Performance Flexible Silicone Rubber High Temperature Cable 300/500V 180°C
Marketing description: Firstflex SIHF Single-Core Series is a high-performance, flexible silicone rubber cable designed for extreme temperature applications. With a 300/500V rating and the ability to withstand temperatures up to 180°C, it is ideal for wiring kilns, boilers, lighting, and other high-heat environments. It also performs efficiently in low temperatures down to -60°C, making it suitable for industrial cool stores and freezers. Additionally, it is approved for public lighting installations in medical areas, ensuring reliable power distribution. Featuring a tinned fine-stranded copper conductor, halogen-free composition (IEC 60754), and high ignition resistance, the cable maintains excellent dielectric strength and insulation stability at elevated temperatures. It is flame retardant, UV stabilised, and resistant to oxidation, ozone, water, and moisture, ensuring long-lasting performance in demanding conditions. In the event of a fire, the silicone insulation forms a protective SiO? layer for enhanced safety. With superior heat, oil, and chemical resistance, the Firstflex SIHF Single-Core Series is a dependable choice for high-performance electrical installations.

Short description: Danger Signs
Marketing description: Firstflex Danger Signs are rigid plastic safety warnings, designed for clear visibility in hazardous areas. Featuring pre-slotted holes for easy mounting, they are available in various directional formats for enhanced safety compliance.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible Earth Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex BGL Series Standard Performance Flexible Earth Cable is designed for a variety of demanding applications, offering extreme flexibility and reliability. Rated at 0.6/1kV and capable of operating at temperatures up to 90°C, this cable is ideal for use in switchboards, flexible droppers from busbars, transformers, load banks, and other equipment requiring either fixed or flexible earth connections. It is also suitable for permanent submersion up to 200 metres, making it an excellent choice for pumping applications. Additionally, the BGL Series is well-suited for welding and electrode leads, providing the necessary durability and performance for these tasks. This versatile cable ensures dependable performance across a range of industrial and commercial settings.

Short description: Ultra Performance Flexible Power & Control Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex (All Rounder) AR series Ultra Performance Flexible Power & Control Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C is designed for a variety of demanding applications. It excels in cable festoon systems, making it ideal for backing gate, machine, and plant applications. This cable is also perfect for energy and drag chains, meeting the highest requirements in drag chain applications. In the food and beverage industry, its resistance to microbes and hydrolysis ensures durability and safety. Additionally, the AR series is well-suited for harsh environments, thanks to its high flexibility, robust TPE sheath, and tensile strength centre support. It can withstand conditions in compost, sewage, car washes, laundry/humid rooms, and outdoor settings. Key product features include oil resistance according to DIN EN 60811-404 at 100°C, silicone-free composition, UV, ozone, and weather resistance per EN 50396 and HD 605 S2, and resistance to coolant fluids, microbes, hydrofluoric acid, salt acid, and weakened sulfuric acid. The ripcord feature allows for faster and core-protected dismantling.

Short description: Standard Performance Fixed Circular TPS Cable 450/750V 90°C (No-Earth)
Marketing description: Firstflex MCN series is designed for a variety of applications, including power distribution for mains and submains in fixed installations, direct burial as part of a Category B wiring system, and outdoor use in wet locations not prone to mechanical damage. Additionally, with the appropriate explosion-proof glands, this cable can be installed in hazardous areas subject to explosion risks, in compliance with AS/NZS 60079.14. The product features metre marking for better length control, UV stabilisation, flame retardancy, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals.

Short description: High Performance Fixed Circular TPS Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex MCX series is designed for a variety of applications, including power distribution for mains and submains in fixed installations, direct burial as part of a Category B wiring system, and outdoor use in wet locations not prone to mechanical damage. It features flexible Class 5 conductors for easy installation in fixed applications. Additionally, with the correct explosion-proof glands, this cable can be installed in hazardous areas subject to explosion risks, in compliance with AS/NZS 60079.14. The product also boasts metre marking for better length control, UV stabilisation, flame retardancy, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals.

Short description: Standard Performance Fixed SWA Circular TPS Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex MCH-SWA series cables are versatile and robust, designed for various applications including control and signal circuits, whether unenclosed, enclosed, or for direct burial. The steel armour provides mechanical protection, enabling the cable to withstand higher stresses, making it suitable for direct burial and use in external or underground projects. These cables are ideal for outdoor use and wet locations where mechanical protection is essential. The armouring is typically connected to earth, serving as the circuit protective conductor (earth wire). With the appropriate explosion-proof glands, these cables can be installed in hazardous areas subject to explosion risks, complying with AS/NZS 60079.14 standards. Key product features include suitability for direct burial, steel wire armouring, UV stabilisation, flame retardancy, metre marking for better length control, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals

Short description: Standard Performance Fixed SWA Circular TPS Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: MCP SWA series is highly versatile, suitable for various applications including mains and submains in fixed installations. Its steel armour provides robust mechanical protection, making it ideal for direct burial and capable of withstanding higher stresses, which is perfect for external or underground projects. Additionally, it is suitable for outdoor use and wet locations where mechanical protection is essential. With the correct explosion-proof glands, this cable can be safely installed in hazardous areas subject to explosion risks, complying with AS/NZS 60079.14 standards. The product features include suitability for circuits buried directly, steel wire armouring, UV stabilisation, flame retardancy, metre marking for better length control, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals.

Short description: Standard Performance Fixed SWA Circular TPS Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: MCP SWA series is designed for a wide range of applications, making it suitable for mains and submains in fixed installations. Its steel armour provides excellent mechanical protection, allowing the cable to withstand higher stresses, making it ideal for direct burial in external or underground projects. Additionally, it is suitable for outdoor use and wet locations where mechanical protection is essential. With the correct explosion-proof glands, this cable can be safely installed in hazardous areas subject to explosion risks, in compliance with AS/NZS 60079.14 standards. Key product features include suitability for circuits buried directly, steel wire armouring, UV stabilisation, flame retardancy, metre marking for better length control, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals.

Short description: Ultra Performance Flexible Rubber Control Cable 300/500V 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex Chemtuff CT Series is an ultra-performance flexible rubber control cable designed for reliability and durability in demanding environments. Rated at 300/500V and 90°C, it is ideal for control and signal applications, including use with machinery, portable tools, and industrial equipment. The high-flexibility cable features a tough SER sheath, offering excellent resistance to oil, heat, abrasion, solvents, and ozone, making it well-suited for harsh industrial conditions. Its UV stabilisation and flame-retardant properties further enhance its durability, making it suitable for both indoor and outdoor lighting and entertainment setups. With extremely fine stranded copper conductors, this cable ensures exceptional flexibility and robust performance in a wide range of applications.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible Control Cable 300/500V 80°C
Marketing description: Firstflex CTP Series is a standard-performance flexible control cable designed for versatility and reliability in industrial and commercial applications. Rated at 300/500V and 80°C, it is ideal for control and signal use in machines, portable tools, and conveying equipment, as well as for indoor lighting and control leads. Featuring fine stranded copper conductors and a specially designed flexible PVC sheath, it offers high flexibility for fixed installations and occasional flexing without tensile load. UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, this cable delivers dependable performance in a range of environments, with stranding to VDE 0295 Class 5 and 6 for added durability.

Short description: High Performance Flexible LSHF Control Cable 300/500V 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex CTP-H Series is a high-performance flexible LSHF (Low Smoke Halogen Free) control cable, designed for demanding applications requiring safety, durability, and environmental resistance. Rated at 300/500V and 90°C, it features tinned fine stranded copper conductors and a flexible, LSHF sheath, making it ideal for marine use in superyachts, pleasure craft, and other marine installations. Its versatility extends to industrial control and signal applications, indoor and outdoor lighting, and rail or rolling stock environments, including buses and coaches. With a submersion rating up to 200 meters, it is also suitable for pump control. UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, the CTP-H Series delivers exceptional flexibility and robust performance across a wide range of challenging environments.

Short description: High Performance Flexible LSHF CBS Control Cable 300/500V 80°C
Marketing description: Firstflex JFCY-H series is a high-performance flexible LSHF CBS control cable, rated for 300/500V and temperatures up to 80°C. Designed for marine applications, it is ideal for installation in superyachts, pleasure craft, and other demanding environments. Suitable for control and signal tasks, it performs reliably in industrial settings, including machines, portable tools, and conveying equipment. The cable’s PVC-free, low-smoke halogen-free design ensures safety, while its submersible capability up to 200 metres makes it ideal for pump control systems. With features like high flexibility, UV stabilisation, flame retardance, and resistance to abrasion, ozone, heat, oil, solvents, and chemicals, the JFCY-H series delivers robust performance.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible CBS Control Cable 300/500V 80°C
Marketing description: Firstflex JFCY series is a flexible CBS control cable rated for 300/500V and temperatures up to 80°C, designed for control and signal applications in industrial environments. It is ideal for use with machines, portable tools, and conveying equipment, offering screened cable performance for EMC compliance. Built for durability, it features high flexibility, UV stabilisation, and resistance to abrasion, ozone, heat, oil, solvents, and chemicals. Flame retardant and designed for grounding with EMC-compatible glands, the JFCY series prevents external interference and ensures reliable performance in both fixed installations and occasional flexing applications.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible Control Cable Coloured Cores (no Earth) 300/500V 80°C
Marketing description: Firstflex JFOB Series is a versatile control cable ideal for managing signals and controls in industrial applications such as machines, portable tools, and conveying equipment. Designed for fixed installations and occasional flexing without tensile load, it features coloured cores for easy identification. Built with high flexibility, the cable is UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, ensuring dependable performance in demanding environments. Rated for 300/500V and up to 80°C, it is a reliable solution for industrial control needs

Short description: High Performance Intrinsically Safe Multipair SWA Overall Foil Screened Tinned Instrumentation Cable 110VAC 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex FT50/55-CS/SWAIS series is a high-performance, intrinsically safe multipair instrumentation cable with steel wire armour (SWA), designed for use in hazardous and harsh environments. Featuring tinned copper conductors and overall foil screening, it is ideal for intrinsically safe circuits in the oil and gas industries, mine sites, and marine applications. Its highly pliable, UV-stabilised, flame-retardant PVC sheath provides excellent resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals, while meeting IEC 60332-3-22 standards for reduced flame propagation. This cable is perfect for signal, control, and instrumentation applications in industrial and marine settings, offering reliable and safe performance.

Short description: High Performance Flexible Overall Foil Screened Cable 110V 75°C
Marketing description: Firstflex HCG3 series is a high-performance, flexible cable with overall foil screening, designed for superior signal integrity and durability in various applications. Featuring tinned fine-stranded copper conductors, it is ideal for RS232, RS423, and building and home BUS automation systems, as well as audio controls and E.L.V signal and power control in industrial machinery, conveying equipment, and instrumentation. Suitable for marine environments, the HCG3 series offers excellent resistance to external interference, UV exposure, heat, oil, and chemicals, ensuring reliable performance at 110V and 75°C.

Short description: Extreme Performance Flexible PUR Energy Chain Control Cable 300/500V 80°C
Marketing description: Firstflex CP Series is an extreme-performance flexible PUR energy chain control cable designed for the most demanding industrial applications. With a voltage rating of 300/500V and a temperature tolerance of up to 80°C, it is ideal for energy and drag chains requiring continuous movement and tight bending radii. Engineered for use in power control or signal transmission, the CP Series is highly robust. Its features include exceptional flexibility, long service life, high resistance to oils, solvents, acids, and coolant emulsions, and outstanding abrasion and tear resistance. UV-stabilised, flame-retardant, and resistant to ozone, hydrolysis, and microbes, this cable is built to endure extreme environments.

Short description: High Performance Flexible Energy Chain Control Cable 300/500V 80°C
Marketing description: Firstflex RH Series is a high-performance flexible energy chain control cable designed for demanding industrial applications. With a voltage rating of 300/500V and a temperature tolerance of up to 80°C, it is ideal for energy and drag chains requiring continuous movement and tight bending radii. Suitable for power control or signal transmission in machines, portable tools, and conveying equipment, the RH Series offers exceptional durability. Key features include extra high flexibility, UV stabilisation, flame retardance, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals, making it a reliable choice for dynamic and harsh environments.

Short description: High Performance Flexible CBS Energy Chain Control Cable 300/500V 80°C
Marketing description: Firstflex RHYC Series is a high-performance flexible CBS energy chain control cable designed for industrial applications requiring screened cables for EMC protection. With a voltage rating of 300/500V and a temperature tolerance of up to 80°C, it is ideal for energy and drag chains where continuous movement and tight bending radii are necessary. The cable features extra high flexibility, UV stabilisation, flame retardance, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals. Its screened design prevents external interference, ensuring reliable signal transmission, and it should be earthed using EMC-compatible glands for optimal performance.

Short description: High Performance Multipair SWA Overall Foil Screened Tinned Instrumentation Cable 110VAC 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex FT50/55-CS/SWA series is a high-performance multipair instrumentation cable with steel wire armour (SWA), designed for durability in harsh and hazardous environments. Featuring tinned copper conductors and overall foil screening, it is ideal for instrumentation applications in the oil and gas industries, mine sites, and marine environments. With a highly pliable, UV-stabilised, flame-retardant PVC sheath, this cable resists heat, oil, and chemicals, while its reduced flame propagation meets IEC 60332-3-22 standards. Perfect for power control, signal, and instrumentation on industrial machinery, it delivers reliable performance in demanding condition

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible LSHF Earth Cable 0.6/1kV 110°C
Marketing description: Firstflex BGLH series is a versatile, high-performance flexible LSHF Earth Cable designed for a wide range of applications, including power distribution in data centres, switchboards, transformers, and load banks. With extreme flexibility, it is ideal for both fixed and flexible earth cable installations. The cable is suitable for use in pumping systems, capable of permanent submersion up to 200 metres, as well as welding and electrode leads. Key features include low smoke halogen-free construction, water and moisture resistance, UV stability, flame retardancy, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals, making it a robust solution for demanding environments.

Short description: Runpotec reel management accessories
Ultra Performance Flexible Rubber Single Sheath Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex ON Series is an ultra-performance flexible rubber single sheath Chemtuff cable designed for demanding applications. Rated at 0.6/1kV and capable of withstanding temperatures up to 90°C, this cable excels in environments requiring high resistance to chemicals, solvents, oils, and fats. Its heavy-duty insulation and outstanding flexibility make it ideal for extension leads on construction sites, machine tools, construction and engineering equipment, and conveyors. The ON Series is also suitable for permanent submersion up to 200 metres, making it perfect for pumping applications. Additionally, its extra durable SER sheath ensures reliability for outdoor temporary power supply and lighting leads in entertainment settings. Key features include UV stabilisation, flame retardancy, extreme flexibility, water and moisture resistance, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals.

Short description: FIRSTFLO Standard Performance Irrigation Cable 25VAC/60VDC 75°C
Marketing description: Firstflex ICLV Series is a standard-performance irrigation cable, designed for controlling valves in residential and commercial irrigation systems, including golf courses and fruit orchards. Operating at 25VAC/60VDC with a temperature rating of 75°C, it is built to withstand harsh environmental conditions and is resistant to ground chemicals. Featuring a high-density polypropylene construction, it is UV stabilised, water and moisture resistant, and offers excellent resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals, ensuring long-lasting performance in demanding irrigation applications.

Short description: High Performance Flexible Appliance / Marine Wire 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex MST series is a high-performance, flexible appliance and marine wire rated at 0.6/1kV and 90°C. It is designed for a variety of applications, including power distribution in switchboards, motors, and transformers, as well as marine environments where tinned copper conductors are essential for boat wiring and other marine uses. Additionally, it is ideal for audio amplifiers and equipment requiring oxygen-free copper wire. The MST series boasts several key features: it uses tinned fine stranded copper conductors, is UV stabilised, flame retardant, and metre marked for better length control. Furthermore, it is resistant to oil and chemicals, making it a robust and reliable choice for demanding environments.

Short description: Standard Performance Solar Cable 1.0/1.5kV DC 120°C
Marketing description: Firstflex Solar Series is a standard-performance solar cable, designed for photovoltaic power supply systems, operating at 1.0/1.5kV DC with a temperature rating of 120°C. Ideal for interconnecting solar modules and DC/AC inverters, it features a tinned fine-stranded copper conductor for enhanced conductivity and longevity. Built for outdoor durability, it is UV resistant, flame retardant, and offers resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals, ensuring reliable performance in solar energy applications.

Short description: High Performance Flexible Twin Garden Lighting Cable ELV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex GLT series is a high-performance, flexible twin garden lighting cable rated for extra-low voltage (ELV) applications and up to 90°C. It is specifically designed for festoon and garden lighting, where a flexible, water-resistant PVC cable is essential. The GLT series features a raised rib on one core for easy polarity identification (+/-), ensuring correct installation. It also includes tinned fine stranded copper conductors, providing excellent conductivity and durability. Additionally, the cable is UV stabilised, water-resistant, and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, making it a reliable choice for outdoor lighting in various environmental conditions.

Short description: Standard Performance Fixed Neutral Screen Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex NST Series is versatile, catering to various applications such as trayscreen commercial cable tray installations, consumer mains for domestic and commercial use (suitable for burial with added protection or in conduit), internal wiring for fixed applications between distribution boards, motor cabling for fixed applications between motor control and electric motors, and lighting circuits where mechanical protection is required. The product features a 1.8mm SPVC sheath, which has a smaller outer diameter compared to standard NS cables, making installation easier. Additionally, the cables are metre marked for better length control, UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, ensuring durability and reliability in demanding environments.

Short description: IP67 Omnia interlocked switch socket outlet
Marketing description: Scame’s Omnia interlocked switch socket outlets are designed for industrial environments, offering both IP44 and IP67 protection levels to suit different operational needs. The IP44 Omnia series provides protection against solid objects over 1 mm and splashing water, making it ideal for indoor applications where moderate environmental exposure is expected. Meanwhile, the IP67 Omnia series ensures complete protection against dust and temporary immersion in water, making it suitable for harsher environments such as outdoor and industrial settings. Both series incorporate a mechanical interlock system, preventing connection or disconnection under load for enhanced safety. Available in 16A to 125A ratings and compliant with IEC 60309 standards, these outlets offer reliability and durability for demanding applications.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible (fixed application) SDI Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex CFX series offers standard performance flexible SDI cables, rated at 0.6/1kV and 90°C, designed for fixed applications. These cables are ideal for power switchboards, submains, subcircuits, and can be buried in underground or overhead ducts. They are also suitable for transformers, load banks, and other equipment requiring fixed installations. The CFX series excels in pumping applications, supporting permanent submersion up to 200 metres, and serves as reliable leads for temporary power supplies in generator sets. In telecommunications, they provide minimal voltage drop with finely stranded large cross-section cables, perfect for fixed applications. Additionally, their small overall diameter makes them ideal for tight spaces.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible Marine Battery / Starter Cable 50V AC /120V DC 75°C
Marketing description: Firstflex MBS series is a standard performance flexible marine battery and starter cable, rated for 50V AC or 120V DC and up to 75°C. Designed for marine battery and starter applications, it is suitable for installation and intermittent flexible use with free movement and no tensile stress. With oxygen-free copper for superior audio performance, the MBS series offers high electrical and thermal conductivity. UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, it ensures durability and reliable operation in both marine and audio environments.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible Marine Figure 8 50V AC/120V DC 75°C
Marketing description: Firstflex MFE series is a standard performance flexible marine Figure 8 cable, rated for 50V AC or 120V DC and up to 75°C. Designed for use in pleasure crafts and other marine applications, it is ideal for installation and intermittent flexible use with free movement and no tensile stress. Featuring oxygen-free copper for superior speaker and audio control performance, the MFE series offers high electrical and thermal conductivity. UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, it ensures reliable and durable performance in demanding marine and audio environments.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible Marine Trailer Cable 50V AC / 120V DC 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex MTR series is a standard performance flexible marine trailer cable, rated for 50V AC or 120V DC and up to 90°C. Designed for marine applications such as pleasure crafts, as well as automotive trailer wiring, it is suitable for installation and intermittent flexible use with free movement and no tensile stress. Featuring high electrical and thermal conductivity, the MTR series is UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, providing durability and reliable performance in demanding environments.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible Marine Twin Sheath 50V AC /120V DC 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex MTS series is a standard performance flexible marine twin sheath cable, rated for 50V AC or 120V DC and up to 90°C. Designed for use in pleasure crafts and other marine applications, it is suitable for installation and intermittent flexible use with free movement and no tensile stress. Featuring a tinned copper conductor for superior corrosion resistance, it is ideal for speaker wiring applications, offering high electrical and thermal conductivity. UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, the MTS series ensures reliable and durable performance in marine and audio environments.

Short description: High Performance Fixed Instrumentation Traffic Loop Cable 250V 80°C
Marketing description: Firstflex TC Loop Series is a high-performance, fixed instrumentation traffic loop cable, designed for traffic signal applications operating at 250V with a temperature rating of 80°C. Engineered to function within the 20kHz to 200kHz frequency range, it is specifically designed for installation in slots cut into road surfaces. With UV resistance, flame retardancy, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals, the TC Loop Series ensures durability and reliable performance in demanding traffic management environments.

Short description: Galvanised Distance Saddles (5mm Stand Off)
Marketing description: Firstflex GCHSHD Series Galvanised Distance Saddles provide secure conduit support with a 5mm stand-off, ensuring proper spacing and stability in electrical installations.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible (Fixed application) LSHF SDI Cable 0.6/1kV 110°C
Marketing description: Firstflex CFXH series is a standard-performance, flexible low-smoke halogen-free (LSHF) SDI cable designed for fixed applications requiring durability and safety. With a 0.6/1kV voltage rating and 110°C operating temperature, it is ideal for power switchboards, submains, data centers, transformers, load banks, and telecommunications where minimal voltage drop is essential. Engineered for reliability, it is suitable for generator set leads and permanent submersion up to 200 meters in pumping applications. Featuring a compact diameter for tight spaces, this cable is flame retardant, UV stabilised, and resistant to water, moisture, heat, oil, and chemicals, ensuring long-term performance in demanding environments.

Short description: Standard Performance Fixed Circular TPS Cable 0.6/1kV 75°C
Marketing description: Firstflex VIN Series are single core, double insulated, PVC Vintol® cables. They are metre marked and have class 2 fixed conductors making for easy termination. Fixed applications where Vintol® cables are used include: pole top breakout connections, utility power terminations, meter and switchboard wiring.

Short description: High Performance Flexible Twin Marine Cable 300/500V 75°C
Marketing description: Firstflex FTM series is ideal for a variety of applications. In marine environments, these cables are perfect for wiring on pleasure craft and other marine uses that require flexible tinned copper conductors. For lighting, these cables are excellent for festoon and garden lighting where flexibility is essential. Additionally, the FTM Series is well-suited for audio applications, providing power to amplifiers and audio equipment with oxygen-free copper wire for superior sound quality.

Short description: Standard Performance Bare Copper Wire CU Strand - Soft Drawn
Marketing description: Firstflex BCW series, is designed for various applications including transformer earth leads, earth grids, and electrical grounding systems.

Short description: Standard Performance Fixed Service Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex MCX VEC series is designed for a wide range of applications, including service cables for domestic, commercial, and industrial purposes. These cables meet the requirements for connection to the point of supply on the Vector network, making them suitable for consumer mains in underground domestic and commercial subdivisions. The product features include a plain annealed circular stranded conductor, metre marking for better length control, UV stabilisation, flame retardancy, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals. These attributes ensure durability and reliability in various environments.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible Control Cable Coloured Cores 300/500V 80°C
Marketing description: Firstflex JC Series is a versatile and durable control and signal cable designed for a wide range of industrial applications, including use on machines, portable tools, and conveying equipment. Suitable for fixed installations and occasional flexing without tensile load, it features coloured cores for applications where color coding is essential. With high flexibility, UV stabilisation, and flame retardancy, the JC Series is built to withstand demanding environments. It is also resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, ensuring reliable performance at 300/500V and up to 80°C.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible Valve Control Cable 300/500V 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex VC Series is a durable and flexible valve control cable specifically designed for use in dairy factory applications. With fine-stranded tinned copper conductors, it offers excellent conductivity and reliability. The cable is UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, ensuring it performs consistently in challenging environments. Rated at 300/500V and capable of withstanding temperatures up to 90°C, the VC Series is ideal for critical valve control operations

Short description: Standard Performance Fixed LSHF CBS Shipboard / Offshore Data Cable 250V 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex SOU series is a standard performance fixed LSHF CBS data cable, rated for 250V and up to 90°C. Designed for marine applications, it is ideal for fixed wiring on oil and gas rigs, shipboard systems, and other environments requiring EMC-compliant screened cables. Additionally, it is well-suited for rail and rolling stock, including locomotives, rail cars, buses, and coaches. Its lightweight, small-diameter design offers an efficient solution for tight spaces, making it a versatile alternative to traditional braided cables. With a low-smoke halogen-free, PVC-free construction, it is UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, ensuring reliable performance in demanding conditions

Short description: Extreme Performance Flexible PUR-HF Reeling/Trailing/Vertical Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex PRRT Series is an extreme-performance, flexible PUR-HF reeling, trailing, and vertical cable, designed for high-stress industrial environments, operating at 0.6/1kV with a temperature rating of 90°C. Featuring a super-tough PUR sheath with interwoven synthetic yarn, it is built for trailing applications, vertical suspension, and high-speed material handling systems, including cable reelers, ship loaders, gantry cranes, stackers, reclaimers, hoists, and magnetic cranes traveling up to 180m/min. Ideal for mine sites, steelworks, smelters, and sub-zero environments, it offers exceptional durability with a significantly smaller external diametre, reduced weight, and smaller bending radii. Engineered for frequent winding and unwinding under simultaneous tensile and torsional stress, it provides robust, all-weather resistance, is self-extinguishing and flame retardant, and withstands ozone, radiation, oil, grease, and petrol. With a tensile strength of up to 25N/mm², the PRRT Series delivers maximum reliability in the toughest conditions.

Short description: High Performance Flexible Rubber Pendant / Lift Cable with Central or External Support 300/500V 75°C
Marketing description: Firstflex P Series is a high-performance, flexible rubber pendant and lift cable designed for cranes, hoists, and lifts, operating at 300/500V with a temperature rating of 75°C. It is available in two types: P Type, featuring a central support system that prevents inner core breakage during twisting, allowing for free suspension up to 80 metres, and P2S Type, which incorporates external steel wire supports for strain relief, anti-twist properties, and extended cable life under tension. Built with extremely fine-stranded copper conductors, the cable offers exceptional flexibility, UV stabilisation, flame retardancy, and resistance to oxidation, ozone, heat, oil, and chemicals. Its high tensile strength, tearing strength, and abrasion resistance make it a durable and reliable solution for demanding material handling applications.

Short description: Standard Performance Fixed LSHF CBS Shipboard / Offshore Power Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex MSMA series is a standard performance fixed LSHF CBS power cable, Lloyds approved and rated to 0.6/1kV and up to 90°C, designed for marine and offshore environments. It is ideal for fixed wiring on oil and gas rigs, shipboard systems, and other applications requiring EMC screened cables. Suitable for rail and rolling stock, including locomotives, rail cars, buses, and coaches, it features a low-smoke halogen-free, PVC-free construction. UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals.

Short description: High Performance Flexible Rubber Cable 450/750V 60°C
Marketing description: Firstflex HR series High Performance Flexible Rubber Cable 450/750V 60°C is engineered for a wide range of challenging applications. In hazardous areas, when paired with explosion-proof glands, it can be safely installed in locations with explosion hazards rated 0.6/1kV (DIN VDE 0165). This cable is ideal for wastewater treatment plants, capable of submersion in polluted liquids and aggressive environments up to 10 meters. Its extra durable CPE sheath makes it perfect for outdoor temporary power supplies and lighting leads in the lighting and entertainment industry. On construction sites, the HR series is favoured for its outstanding flexibility, durability, and cable memory. It is also suitable for pumping applications, with the ability to be permanently submerged up to 200 metres. Additionally, it excels in materials and handling systems, being suitable for cable spring reelers and large energy chains. Key product features include UV stabilisation, flame retardance, water and moisture resistance, good elongation at break, and resistance to environmental factors such as oxidation, ozone, and sunlight. It also boasts good tensile strength, tearing strength, abrasion resistance, and is heat, oil, and chemical resistant.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible Control Cable Coloured Cores 300/500V 80°C
Marketing description: The Firstflex JT Series is a standard-performance flexible control cable designed for a wide range of industrial applications. Rated at 300/500V and 80°C, it is ideal for control and signal tasks on machines, portable tools, and conveying equipment. Flexible enough for fixed installations or occasional flexing without tensile load, this cable features coloured cores for easy identification in specific applications. With fine-stranded copper conductors, UV stabilisation, flame retardance, and resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals, the JT Series delivers reliable performance in demanding environments.

Short description: Standard Performance Flexible CBS Control Cable Coloured Cores 300/500V 80°C
Marketing description: Firstflex JTCY series is a standard performance flexible CBS control cable with colored cores, rated for 300/500V and up to 80°C. Designed for control and signal applications, it is ideal for machines, portable tools, conveying equipment, and other industrial uses requiring EMC-compliant screened cables. Suitable for fixed installations and occasional flexing without tensile stress, it features high flexibility, UV stabilisation, and flame retardance. Resistant to heat, oil, and chemicals, the JTCY series prevents external interference and must be grounded with EMC-compatible glands, making it a reliable choice for applications needing colored cores.

Short description: High Performance Flexible Flatform Cable Indoor/Outdoor 450/750V 70°C
Marketing description: Firstflex F-PVC series is a high-performance, flexible flatform cable designed for both indoor and outdoor applications, operating at 450/750V with a temperature rating of 70°C. It is ideal for material handling systems, including cranes, festooning systems, conveyor systems, and energy chains, where flexibility and durability are essential. Its flat design allows for easy installation in confined spaces, while its UV-stabilised, flame-retardant, and chemical-resistant properties ensure long-lasting performance in humid, wet, and outdoor environments. Additionally, it supports permanent submersion up to 200 metres, making it suitable for pumping applications. With a tensile load capacity of up to 15 N/mm², a travel speed of 180 metres per minute, and resistance to oxidation, ozone, and extreme temperatures, the Firstflex F-PVC series is built for reliability in demanding conditions.

Short description: Standard Performance Multipair Overall Foil Screened Instrumentation Cable 110Vac 90°C
Marketing description: Firstflex E50/55-CS series is a standard-performance multipair instrumentation cable with overall foil screening, designed for reliable signal and power control in industrial applications. Suitable for use in machines, conveying equipment, and similar setups, this cable offers durability and performance at 110Vac and 90°C. Its UV-stabilised, flame-retardant construction meets IEC 60332-1 standards, providing excellent resistance to heat, oil, and chemicals, making it a dependable choice for various industrial environments.

Short description: Extreme Performance Industrial Curly Cord Spiral Cables PUR Outer Sheath 1:4 Elasticity Ratio
Marketing description: Firstflex CC Series is an extreme-performance industrial curly cord spiral cable, designed with a super-durable PUR outer sheath and a 1:4 elasticity ratio for long-lasting flexibility and reliability. Ideal for mobile power tools in production lines, engineering workshops, and laboratory environments, it features excellent elasticity, reverse bending strength, and extreme abrasion resistance. Additionally, its microbe and hydrolysis resistance make it well-suited for the food and beverage industry. Built for harsh conditions, the CC Series is UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to oil, chemicals, and microbes, ensuring exceptional durability in demanding industrial applications.

Short description: High Performance CANBUS E.L.V BUS / Automation Cable
Marketing description: Firstflex BCB Series offers high-performance CANBUS and automation cables designed for demanding applications. These cables are ideal for Control Area Network (CANBUS) systems in automation technology, where complex controllers and control units need seamless networking. Their versatility makes them suitable for industries like textiles, construction machinery, and medical devices. The series includes options for fixed indoor wiring and drag chain applications, ensuring reliability in energy chains and harsh industrial or outdoor environments. Key features include low-capacitance foam skin polyethylene insulation, oil-resistant SPVC, UV stabilisation, flame retardance, and excellent resistance to heat, chemicals, and oil. The drag chain series also offers superior bending strength and durability, making it a robust choice for tough conditions.

Short description: High Performance Flexible Silicone Rubber SWB High Temperature Cable 300/500V 180°C
Marketing description: Firstflex SICY Series is a high-performance, flexible silicone rubber steel wire braided (SWB) cable designed for extreme temperature and tough environments. Rated at 300/500V and capable of withstanding temperatures up to 180°C, it is ideal for kilns, boilers, lighting, and other high-temperature applications, while also performing reliably in cold conditions down to -60°C. The steel wire braid enhances mechanical strength and provides disturbance-free signal transmission, making it suitable for demanding industrial environments. Featuring a tinned fine-stranded copper conductor, halogen-free composition, and high ignition resistance, the cable maintains excellent dielectric strength and insulation stability at elevated temperatures. It is UV stabilised, flame retardant, and resistant to oxidation, ozone, heat, oil, and chemicals, ensuring durability in harsh conditions. Additionally, in the event of a fire, the silicone insulation forms a protective SiO? layer for added safety, making the Firstflex SICY Series a reliable choice for high-performance electrical installations in challenging environments.

Short description: High Performance Flexible Twin Marine Cable 0.6/1kV 90°C
Marketing description: TW-T series is a versatile solution for various applications. In marine settings, it provides reliable battery power supplies and winch operations. For automotive use, it serves as durable battery/jumper cables and power leads for forklifts and field conveyors, suitable for both indoor and outdoor environments. In telecommunications, its finely stranded large cross-section ensures minimal voltage drop. Additionally, it excels in audio applications, supplying power to amplifiers and audio equipment with oxygen-free copper wire for superior sound quality.

Short description: 3 Pin Moulded male plug & 75mm Stripped Tails 250/440V V-90
Marketing description: Firstflex Cordset is a durable 3-metre power replacement cord for power tools, construction, and engineering equipment. Featuring a 3-pin molded male plug with 75mm stripped tails, it operates at 250/440V V-90. With high-flexibility Class 5 copper conductors, it is UV stabilised, oil, and chemical resistant, ensuring reliable performance in tough environments.

Short description: IP67 Optima plug
Marketing description: Scame's OPTIMA Series offers industrial plugs with IP44 and IP67 ratings, ensuring reliable performance in various environments. The IP44-rated plugs are splash-proof, suitable for indoor and light-duty applications, while the IP67-rated plugs are dust-tight and protected against temporary immersion, ideal for demanding conditions. Available in current ratings from 16A to 125A, these plugs feature robust construction and screw terminals for secure connections.

Short description: IP67 Optima plug
Marketing description: Scame's OPTIMA Series offers industrial plugs with IP44 and IP67 ratings, ensuring reliable performance in various environments. The IP44-rated plugs are splash-proof, suitable for indoor and light-duty applications, while the IP67-rated plugs are dust-tight and protected against temporary immersion, ideal for demanding conditions. Available in current ratings from 16A to 125A, these plugs feature robust construction and screw terminals for secure connections.

Short description: Domestic power supply adaptors
Marketing description: Electrex by Firstflex CAMPSAFE Domestic Power Supply Adaptors provide a safe and convenient way to connect caravans, RVs, and portable buildings to standard domestic power outlets. Featuring a 10A plug to 16A socket conversion, they include a built-in miniature circuit breaker (MCB) for overload protection. Designed for outdoor use, these adaptors come in various lengths up to 25 metres, with an IPX4 weatherproof enclosure for added durability.

Short description: Brass Earth Tag
Marketing description: Brass Earth Tags provide a reliable and efficient solution for grounding in cable gland installations. Manufactured from durable, high-quality brass, these earth tags ensure a secure electrical connection, enhancing safety and compliance with grounding requirements. Designed for versatility, they are compatible with various gland sizes and types, making them an essential accessory for industrial and commercial applications. Easy to install and built to last, Brass Earth Tags are the perfect choice for robust and effective earthing solutions.

Short description: PVC Shroud
Marketing description: PVC Shrouds offer a practical and cost-effective solution to enhance cable gland installations by providing additional protection against environmental factors. Designed to cover and seal the exposed parts of cable glands, they prevent the ingress of dirt, dust, and moisture while ensuring a clean and professional finish. Made from durable, flexible PVC, these shrouds are easy to install and available in various sizes to fit different cable glands. Ideal for industrial and commercial applications, PVC Shrouds deliver enhanced durability and protection for long-lasting performance.

Short description: Nylon Standard Gland IP68 (complete with Locknut)
Marketing description: The GPM/GPG series Nylon Standard Gland IP68, complete with locknut, is designed for watertight glanding of unscreened circular cables. These glands feature a sealing nut with a locking mechanism that ensures a firm grip on cables and accommodates a wider cable range. Installation is made easier with a long metric thread. Constructed from UL nylon 66 94V-2, the product is halogen-free, UV-stabilised, and self-extinguishing. Key components include a nylon body, EPDM rubber seal and washer, and a polyamide traction relief clamping insert. The glands operate efficiently within a temperature range of -40°C to 100°C, with short-term tolerances up to 120°C, and offer IP68 water protection with a pressure rating of 5 bar. These features make the GPM/GPG series a reliable choice for robust and durable cable glanding applications

Short description: Metal IP68 EMC Long Thread Gland for Screened Cables (less Locknut)
Marketing description: The GK-EMC Series Metal IP68 EMC Long Thread Gland is engineered for watertight glanding of screened circular cables, specifically for Variable Speed Drive (VSD) applications. It is ideal for glanding copper-braided screened VSD cables at both input (power source to drive) and output (drive to motor) ends. This gland is free from halogen, silicone, phosphorous, and cadmium, and is self-extinguishing. Constructed from bright nickel-plated extruded brass, it complies with BS EN 50262 1999 and BS 2874 CZ121 3Pb standards. It features a PCP (Neoprene) rubber seal and O-ring, along with a polyamide 6 traction relief clamping insert, providing enhanced reliability. The GK-EMC Series operates effectively in temperatures ranging from -40°C to 80°C, with short-term tolerances up to 100°C, and delivers IP68 water protection with a pressure rating of 5 bar. This makes it an excellent choice for demanding EMC cable glanding requirements.

Short description: Bright Nickel Plated Brass EMC Locknuts with Cutting Edges
Marketing description: Firstflex LN-EMC Series features bright nickel-plated brass EMC locknuts with cutting edges, designed to establish an electrically conductive connection for optimal screened cable performance?.

Short description: Little Grippers 16mm and 20mm
Marketing description: Firstflex LG Series, also known as "Little Grippers," are nylon quick-action flex clamps designed for secure cable management. They are available in two sizes: 16mm, suitable for flexible cables with an outer diameter of 5mm to 10mm, and 20mm, accommodating cables from 8mm to 13mm. Each clamp comes with a lock bush to ensure a firm hold, making them ideal for various industrial and commercial applications.

Short description: Bright Nickel Plated Brass Reducer
Marketing description: Firstflex RN Series are bright nickel-plated brass reducers, designed for securely adapting larger threaded entries to smaller cable gland sizes in electrical installations?.

Short description: Bright Nickel Plated Brass Enlarger
Marketing description: Firstflex AM Series are bright nickel-plated brass enlargers, designed to adapt smaller threaded entries to larger cable gland sizes in electrical installations

Short description: Wide Mouth Crimp Lugs
Marketing description: Firstflex CLWM Series are wide mouth crimp lugs, designed for easier termination of fine-stranded cables, ensuring secure and reliable electrical connections?.

Short description: Bootlace Ferrules Non-Insulated
Marketing description: Firstflex BF Series are non-insulated bootlace ferrules, designed for secure and efficient termination of fine-stranded cables in electrical applications?.

Short description: Single Phase Electronic Watt-hour Meter
Foot Switch
Marketing description: Enhance workplace safety and boost machine efficiency with our robust Footswitch. Designed for hands-free operation, it allows seamless on/off control of electrical equipment, reducing employee risks and improving workflow. Constructed from durable cast aluminium with a powder-coated finish, it withstands tough environments while ensuring long-lasting performance. Featuring an 85mm entry for steel-capped boots, secure floor-mounting options, and IP65-rated protection against fluids, this footswitch is built for reliability. With 10 Amp (230V) / 5 Amp (400V) capacity, it’s the perfect solution for industrial applications where safety and durability matter.

Short description: PVC Switchboard Panels
Marketing description: Firstflex PVC Switchboard Panels are flame-retardant, self-extinguishing panels, designed for safe and durable electrical enclosures with customisable sizing options.

Short description: Aluminium Extrusion DIN Rail
Marketing description: Firstflex Aluminium Extrusion DIN Rail is a durable, precision-engineered mounting solution, designed for securely holding electrical components in control panels.

Short description: Cupboard Door Switch
Marketing description: Electrex by Firstflex cupboard door switches are compact, reliable solutions designed to automatically control lighting or other electrical functions when a cabinet or cupboard door is opened or closed. Ideal for kitchen cabinets, wardrobes, tool cupboards, and commercial storage units, these switches help improve convenience, energy efficiency, and safety. Built with durable materials and a simple yet effective mechanism, Electrex by Firstflex cupboard door switches ensure seamless operation and long-lasting performance. Whether for residential or commercial use, they provide an effortless way to enhance accessibility and automate lighting with precision.

Short description: Single Metal, Open Plate and Double Metal Flush boxes
Marketing description: Firstflex Metal Flush Boxes, available in single, double, and open plate designs, provide secure and fire-rated enclosures for electrical fittings in fire-resistant walls. Built for durability and easy installation, they ensure safe and reliable housing for electrical components in both residential and commercial applications.

Short description: Extruded PVC Gasket
Marketing description: Firstflex Extruded PVC Gasket is a flexible and durable sealing solution, designed for secure insulation and protection in electrical enclosures.

Short description: Gentech float switches
Marketing description: Gentech float switches provide reliable, hassle-free liquid level monitoring for a wide range of applications, from industrial tanks to home water systems. Built with high-quality materials and precision engineering, these switches ensure accurate detection, seamless automation, and superior durability in even the harshest environments. Whether you need to control pumps, prevent overflow, or detect leaks, Gentech float switches offer a dependable, cost-effective solution designed to keep your systems running smoothly. Simple to install and maintenance-free, they’re the smart choice for efficient liquid management.

Short description: Meter Box - Double Window
Marketing description: Electrex by Firstflex MGB1 Meter Box Double Window is a rugged and weather-resistant enclosure, designed to securely house electrical meters in residential and commercial applications. Featuring dual viewing windows for easy meter reading, it supports both surface and flush mounting for versatile installation. With an IPX4 rating and an included flashing kit for weather tightness, it ensures durability and protection in harsh environments. Constructed from high-quality, rust-proof materials, it meets UL94 HB flammability standards, making it an ideal choice for long-lasting performance, especially in coastal and corrosive environments.

Short description: Warning Tape
Marketing description: Firstflex Warning Tapes are high-visibility underground markers, designed to identify buried electrical and communication cables. Compliant with AS/NZS 2648.1 standards, it ensures long-lasting durability in harsh soil conditions.

Short description: Terminal Strips
Marketing description: Firstflex Terminal Strip is a secure and organized wiring solution, designed for efficient electrical connections with various amp ratings.

Short description: Catwire Carousel
Marketing description: Firstflex Catenary Wire Carousel is a sturdy, powder-coated dispenser designed for efficient and tangle-free handling of catenary wire rolls.

Short description: Open Link Chain
Marketing description: Firstflex Open Link Chain is a bright zinc-plated chain, designed for versatile and reliable load-bearing applications.

Short description: Protecta series
Marketing description: Scame’s IP66 Protecta Series Mounting Box and Enclosures M95 offer rugged and weatherproof protection for electrical components in harsh industrial environments. With high impact resistance and secure sealing, they ensure durability and reliable performance against dust, water jets, and extreme conditions.

Short description: IP67 Optima connector
Marketing description: Scame's OPTIMA Series connectors are designed for industrial applications, offering both IP44 and IP66/IP67/IP69 protection ratings to suit various environmental conditions. These connectors are available in current ratings of 16A, 32A, 63A, and 125A, accommodating a wide range of power requirements. Constructed from robust thermoplastic material, they ensure durability and reliability in demanding settings. The connectors feature screw terminals for secure wiring and are compatible with both straight and angled cable entries, providing flexibility during installation.

Short description: Scame enclosure accessories
Marketing description: Scame have a comprehensive range of enclosure accessories, enabling customisation and modifications for secure and efficient installations in various applications.

Short description: Flexible Metal Conduit Galvanised Steel Bare IP40
Marketing description: Firstflex GFC Series Galvanised Flexible Conduit is designed for high-performance cable protection in demanding environments, such as processing plants and areas exposed to sparks, heat, and mechanical hazards. Constructed from highly flexible, helically wound galvanised steel, it offers superior mechanical strength, halogen-free composition, and low fire hazard properties. With an IP40 protection rating and an operating temperature range of -40°C to 300°C, the GFC Series ensures reliable performance in industrial applications where durability and flexibility are critical.

Short description: Galvanised Half Saddles
Marketing description: Firstflex HSG Series Galvanised Half Saddles provide secure and durable support for conduits, ensuring stability in electrical installations.

Short description: Amphenol Circular Connectors with Threaded Collar M29 Diameter Polyamide
Marketing description: Amphenol Ecomate T3 Circular Connectors are versatile, high-performance connectors designed for industrial, medical, and marine applications. Featuring a durable polyamide body with an M29 threaded collar, these connectors provide secure and reliable connections, preventing accidental uncoupling. With a strain relief mechanism and built-in gasket, they offer excellent sealing and protection against environmental factors. The IP67 rating ensures water and dust resistance when mated or capped, making them ideal for harsh conditions. Available in 3P+E and 6P+E configurations, they support various voltage and current ratings, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of electrical systems

Short description: Connectors for single core cables to 150mm²
Marketing description: PL Series single-core cable connectors are designed for demanding applications, including temporary power supplies in the entertainment industry, industrial sites, and mining operations where daisy-chaining and extending flexible cables are essential. Constructed with super high-impact flame-retardant thermoplastic insulators, these connectors are color-coded and individually keyed to prevent accidental cross-mating. A secondary locking pin ensures secure connections, even under cable torsion or handling. With 23 spring-loaded active contact elements, they provide low insertion force, minimal power loss, and insulation resistance greater than 5 ohms at 500 V DC. Rated for 500 Amp at 70°C (upgradeable to 800 Amp), they are reliable and efficient, with optional protective and environmental dust caps available for added durability.

Short description: Heavy Duty Amphenol Multi-Pole Power Connectors THERMOPLASTIC 3P + E 1 Lever, 10 Amp 400V
Marketing description: Amphenol C146 Series Thermoplastic 3P + E 1 Lever, 10 Amp 400V connectors are heavy-duty multi-pole power connectors designed for industrial, medical, and entertainment applications. Featuring a rugged thermoplastic body, a secure single-lever locking mechanism, and silver-plated contacts, they provide reliable electrical connections. With an IP65 rating when mated, these connectors ensure durability and protection in demanding environments

Short description: Nylon Reducers
Marketing description: Firstflex RT Series are durable nylon reducers, designed to adapt larger threaded entries to smaller cable gland sizes for secure and reliable electrical installations?.
